<h2>Changes</h2>

<p><a href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1728657/335850969-1c95f27f-bc97-41ae-9c41-844bd650bda4.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..-C-_pqJWWWVWTBFjfSnYL8NzfJrQxUE7btj6g-WVcDo" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"><img alt="33splash" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1728657/335850969-1c95f27f-bc97-41ae-9c41-844bd650bda4.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..-C-_pqJWWWVWTBFjfSnYL8NzfJrQxUE7btj6g-WVcDo" /></a></p>

<h3>üöÄ Features</h3>
<ul>
<li>Drawing capabilities to sketch over photos taken in the field and annotate drawing templates</li>
<li>Copy and pasting of feature attributes using the OS clipboard as well as a dedicated feature attribute transfer action</li>
<li>Tap-on-canvas finger digitizing mode provides a faster way to enter points and vertices</li>
<li>The feature form‚Äôs value relation widget gained grouping capabilities to enhance ordering of items</li>
<li>The feature form‚Äôs value map widget gained a toggle buttons interface for faster data entry and an item filtering for large combobox lists</li>
<li>Camera switcher now available in the ‚Äònon-native‚Äô camera allowing users to hop between the front and back camera as well as other available video devices</li>
<li>Image decoration overlay on top of the map canvas</li>
<li><a href="https://docs.qfield.org/how-to/plugins/" rel="nofollow">Plugin framework</a> to empower users to customize QField using Javascript &amp; QML</li>
</ul>
<h3>‚ú® Improvements</h3>
<ul>
<li>Layers visibility and opacity can now be changed during ongoing digitizing of geometries</li>
<li>Visibility and collapsing/expanding buttons added to the dashboard legend</li>
<li>Information overlays revamped to sit on top of the map canvas alongside a refined styling to better focus on displayed details</li>
<li>Information overlays now respect projects‚Äô distance unit type when reporting altitude and distance to destination details</li>
<li>The feature form will now respect projects‚Äô ‚Äòreuse last entered value‚Äô setting as configured through QGIS when digitizing new features</li>
<li>Map canvas rotation can be frozen by long-pressing on the map canvas and unchecking the map rotation menu item</li>
<li>Geometry editing tools such as reshape now respect snapping to angle functionality</li>
<li>Elevation profile overlay gained a beautiful dark theme styling variant</li>
<li>Significant stylus handling improvements</li>
<li>Large set of library updates - including QGIS (3.36.3) and Qt (6.6.3) ‚Äì resulting in a stabler experience</li>
</ul>

<h3>ü™ü Windows improvements</h3>
<ul>
<li>Support for direct Bluetooth communication to external GNSS devices</li>
<li>Windows packages are now signed</li>
</ul>

<h3>üçé iOS improvements</h3>
<ul>
<li>Support for reading a PostgreSQL pg_service.conf file placed in the QField application data folder</li>
</ul>
